title: Need 57 RP for the Discount Demons Bundle
body:
Hey Riot,

I was wondering if I could get 57 RP so that I can purchase the 'Discount Demons' bundle I currently have 3241 RP{{item:3070}}. I just purchased a $25 Riot Point gift voucher and a forgot about the RP price changes a few months back, I would really like myself those skins since they are amazing and I only started the game and really got into it after the Harrowing event of 2014, so if you could help me out I would be very happy thank you for time :).

replies.body:
try sending a support ticket with an MS paint picture.
doubt it'll work though, they rarely give out more than 30.
Yeah thanks I did send one through the Help and Support, but yeah I cant draw >.< at all. But I was hoping they could compensate the difference since its a bundle and not one skin.
please post your MS paint picture here for us to enjoy. Ty.
